name: Industrial Power Transformer, Domestic, 240 X 480 Primary Volts 50/60Hz, 120 X 240 Secondary Volts, 100VA Rating
short_description: Reduces 240 x 480 V (primary voltage) to 120 x 240 V (secondary voltage)
Rated up to 100 VA
Silicon steel-laminated core and copper magnet wire for increased transformer efficiency
Epoxy-encapsulated to resist moisture, dust, and industrial contaminants
Built-in fuse clips on secondary side save panel space and wiring time because they do not have to be manually installed in the field
product_description: This Siemens MT0100M industrial power transformer has a 100 VA power rating, a voltage letter designation of M, and reduces 240 x 480 V (primary voltage) to 120 x 240 V (secondary voltage). A silicon steel-laminated core and copper magnet wire increase transformer efficiency, which decreases the destabilizing effect of inrush current on secondary voltage. Epoxy-encapsulated transformer coils resist moisture, dust, and industrial contaminants, and built-in terminals and barriers resist breakage. Steel mounting brackets provide stable mounting and slotted mounting feet make installation easier. The thermal insulation class for this transformer is 105 degrees C with a 55 degree C (131 degrees F) temperature rise. This power transformer is Underwriters Laboratories (UL) listed and CSA International certified, and is suitable for use in transforming electrical power for machine tools and industrial control circuits. Specifications Primary voltage240 x 480 VSecondary voltage120 x 240 VVoltage letterMPower rating100 VAFrequency rating50/60 HzRating marksUL, CSABuilt-in fuse clipsSecondary sideThermal class105 degrees C (221 degrees F) Power transformers change voltage from a supplied voltage to a required voltage. They also isolate control circuits from power and lighting circuits, which reduces electronic interference. Transformers accommodate specific primary voltages and currents, and supply specific secondary voltages and currents. Power transformers are used in a wide range of applications, such as home electronics power supplies, machine tools, and the distribution of electricity. Siemens manufactures electronic products for building automation, industrial drives, lighting, energy generation, medical equipment, and rail transportation. The company, founded in 1847 and headquartered in Munich, Germany, meets International Standards Organization (ISO) standards 14001, 9001 and TS 16949.

name: Control Transformer 24V 40VA, Multi-Tap 120/208/240V to 24V AC Industrial Power Transformer with Foot Mount, Easy Installation and Reliable Output for HVAC Furnace, Relays, and Gas Valves
short_description: Easy & Secure Installation with Added Value – Built with standard foot mounts and pre-stripped, color-coded wires for quick, error-free connection. Includes five premium red wire connectors (high-quality nylon shell & metal spring) for enhanced safety, insulation, and secure wiring. The compact, enclosed design fits neatly into HVAC control boxes or industrial panels, making installation faster, safer, and more reliable

Wide Voltage Input Compatibility & Clear Wiring Identification - Supports 120V, 208V, and 240V multi-tap primary inputs (WHT–BLK–RED–ORG) with a 24V AC secondary output (RED–GRN), rated at 40VA. Each lead is clearly identified for fast, accurate wiring, ensuring compatibility with HVAC, furnace, and industrial control systems while maintaining consistent performance across varying voltage environments

Stable Output & Precision Performance - Delivers consistent, clean 24V power with a precise no-load voltage range of AC 26.6V–27.5V. Maintains reliable control circuit operation, preventing malfunctions in HVAC systems, relays, and gas valves that depend on steady low-voltage power

Industrial-Grade Durability & Materials - Constructed with high-purity copper windings and premium silicon steel core laminations for low energy loss and cool operation. The transformer is oil-impregnated and fully encapsulated to enhance insulation, heat dissipation, and long-term stability. Its rugged build ensures reliable performance and strong resistance to dust, moisture, and harsh industrial environments

Broad Compatibility & Trusted Replacement Options - Designed as a reliable replacement for multiple 24V 40VA control transformers used in HVAC and industrial systems. Compatible with Gemline GT446, Supco SXT105, UEI UET105 / UET115, Grainger 6WU91, Jard 4031F, Mars 50203, White-Rodgers GT4031F / 90-T40F3, Armstrong TWF424-40, Source 1 S1-T2404F, Packard PF42440, Robertshaw 620-206 / 620-406 / 620-482, and Honeywell AT140A1018 / AT40A1121 / AT40A1139 / AT40B1214
